SA11bsa047_u:400: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā- “samāhitacitto yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti” iti /
SA11bsa047_u:401: śamatho lābhādikāmanānirapekṣasya samyakpravṛttau sthirasya duḥkhādyadhivāsanaśilasyārabdhavīryasya śīghrataraṃ sampadyate /
SA11bsa047_u:402: ata eva āryasaṃdhinirvocanādau dānādaya uttarottaratvena varṇitāḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:403_1: praṇāmādikaṃ kṛtvā pāpadeśanāṃ puṇyānumodanāṃ vidhāya sakalajagadabhyuddharaṇāśayo
SA11bsa047_u:403_2: mahākaruṇām evābhimukhīkṛtya kāyam ṛjuṃ praṇidhāya sukhāsanopaviṣṭaḥ paryaṅkamābhujya
SA11bsa047_u:404: tatra prathamaṃ tāvad yad vastu vicārayitavyaṃ yāvatā prakāreṇa saṅkṣepataḥ sakalavastusaṅgraho bhavati tatra cittaṃ badhnīyat /
SA11bsa047_u:407: etaccādikarmikasya vikṣepadoṣaparihārārtha saṃkṣiptaṃ tāvad yuktam ālambayitum /
SA11bsa047_u:408: yadā tu jitamanaskāro bhavati tadā skandhadhātvādibhedena viśodhya vistaraśo 'pyālambata eva /
SA11bsa047_u:409: tathā sandhinirmocanādau yoginām aṣṭādaśaprakāraśūnyatālambanādibhedena nānāprakāram ālambanam uktam /
SA11bsa047_u:410: atraiva bhagavatā sattvānugrahād rūpyarūpyādibhedena saṃkṣepamadhyavistāraiḥ vastubhedo 'bhidharmādau nirdiṣṭaḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:412: tato niścitya sarvaṃ vastusaṅgrahaṃ tatraiva punaścittaṃ prabandhena prerayet /
SA11bsa047_u:413: yada tvantarā rāgādinā cittaṃ bahirvikṣipet tadāvagamya vikṣepatām aśubhādibhāvanayā vikṣepam upaśāmya punastatraivoparyupari cittaṃ prerayet /
SA11bsa047_u:418_0: atha yadā styānamiddhābhibhavād āalambanagrahaṇāprakaṭatayālīnaṃ cittaṃ bhavati tadā
SA11bsa047_u:419: atha yadā pūrvahasitaramitādyanusmarato 'ntarā cittam uddhataṃ paśyet,
SA11bsa047_u:422: atha yadā layauddhatyabhyāṃ viviktatayā samapravṛttaṃ svarasavāhicittaṃ paśyet tadābhogaśithīlīkaraṇād (Bhk 183) upekṣate /
SA11bsa047_u:425: yadā tu tatrālambane 'nabhisaṃskāravāhi yāvadicchaṃ cittaṃ pravṛttaṃ bhavati,
SA11bsa047_u:431: ayaṃ ca śamathamārgo bhagavatā āryaprajñāpāramitādau nirdiṣṭaḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:457: eṣa caiṣāṃ padānām arthaḥ pūrvācāryaiḥ maitreyeṇa ca vyākhyātaḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:458: saṃkṣepeṇa sarvasaiva samādheḥ ṣaḍ doṣā bhavanti /
SA11bsa047_u:472: tathā hi- samādherguṇeṣvabhisampratyayalakṣaṇayā śraddhayā tatra yogino 'bhilāṣa utpadyate /
SA11bsa047_u:480: layauddhatyāpraśamanakāle tvanābhogadoṣaḥ tatpratipakṣeṇa ca cetanā bhāvanīyā /
SA11bsa047_u:481: layauddhatyapraśame sati yadā cittaṃ praśamavāhi tadābhogadoṣaḥ,
SA11bsa047_u:483: ebhiraṣṭābhiḥ prahāṇasaṃskāraiḥ samanvāgataḥ samādhiḥ paramakarmaṇyo bhavati /
SA11bsa047_u:485: ata evoktaṃ sūtra- “[aṣṭa]prahāṇa [saṃskāra]samanvāgataḥ ṛddhipādaṃ bhāvayati” iti /
SA11bsa047_u:486: eṣā ca cittaikāgratā uttarottarakarmaṇyatāsamprayogād ālambanādiguṇaviśeṣayogācca dhyānārūpisamāpattiḥ vimokṣādivyapadeśaṃ labhate /
SA11bsa047_u:487: tathā hi yadopekṣāvedanāsamprayuktā savitarkasavicārā sā bhavati,
SA11bsa047_u:489: yadā ca kāmatṛṣṇayā pāpadharmaiśca] viviktā bhavati [vitarkavicāra]prītisukhādhyātmasamprasādaiḥ samprayuktā bhavati,
SA11bsa047_u:492: yadā vitarkavicārarahitā prathamadhyānabhūmitṛṣṇayā viviktā ca bhavati /
SA11bsa047_u:505: anyathā hi tīrthikānāmiva samādhimātreṇa kleśaprahāṇaṃ na syāt /
SA11bsa047_u:507: kiñcāpi bhāvayet samādhimetaṃ na co bibhāveyya sā ātmasaṃjñām /
SA11bsa047_u:508: punaḥ prakupyati kileṣu tasya yathodrakasyeha samādhibhāvanā // iti /
SA11bsa047_u:515: jñānaṃ nirātmakaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ nirābhāse na paśyati // iti /
SA11bsa047_u:516: tatrāyamarthaḥ- prathamaṃ yogī ye rūpiṇo dharmā bāhyārthatayā paraiḥ parikalpitāsteṣu tāvad vicārayet /
SA11bsa047_u:521: paramāṇūṃśca bhāgaśaḥ pratyavekṣa- māṇo yogī tān arthānna samanupaśyati /
SA11bsa047_u:522: tasyāsamanupaśyata evaṃ bhavati cittamātramevaitat sarvaṃ na punarbāhyo 'rthā vipadyate / tadevam-
SA11bsa047_u:528: tatra yaccittamātraṃ tadapyasati grāhye grāhako na yukto grāhakasya grāhyapekṣatvad tataścittaṃ grāhyagrāhakaviviktam advayameva cittamiti vicārayed advayalakṣaṇe-
SA11bsa047_u:532: evaṃ cittamātramatikramya tadapi dvayanirābhasaṃ yajjñānaṃ tadatikrameta /
SA11bsa047_u:533: svataḥ parato bhāvānāṃ janmānupapatteḥ grāhyagrāhakayoścālīkatve tadavyatirekāt tasyāpi satyatvamayuktamiti vicārayet /
SA11bsa047_u:538: tathā cādvayajñānanirābhāse jñāne yadā sthito yogī tadā paramatattve sthitatvāt,
SA11bsa047_u:540: etadeva tat mahāyānam ucyate yat paramatattvadarśanam /
SA11bsa047_u:541: etadeva tat paramatattvadarśanaṃ yat sarvadharmān prajñācakṣuṣā nirūpayataḥ samyagjñānāvaloke satyadarśanam /
SA11bsa047_u:544: atredṛśamevādarśanamabhipretaṃ na tu nimīlitākṣajātyandhānāmiva pratyayavaikalyād amanasikārato vā yadadarśanam /
SA11bsa047_u:546: tato bhāvābhiniveśadiviparyāsavāsanāyā aprahīṇatvād asaṃjñisamāpattyādivyutthitasyeva punarapi bhāvābhiniveśamūlasya rāgādikleśagaṇasyotpatteramukta eva yogī bhavet /
SA11bsa047_u:549: tatrāpi prajñayā nirūpayato yo 'nupalambhaḥ sa tatrāmanasikāro 'bhipreto na manasikārābhāvamātram /
SA11bsa047_u:550: na hyasaṃjñisamāpattyādiriva anādikāliko rūpādyabhiniveśo manasikāraparivarjanamātrāt prahīyate /
SA11bsa047_u:551: saṃśayā prahāṇe tu na pūrvopalabdheṣu ca rūpādiṣvabhiniveśamanasikāraparivarjanaṃ śakyaṃ kartum agnyaparivarjane dāhāparivarjanavat /
SA11bsa047_u:552: tathāmī rūpādimithyāvikalpāḥ kaṇṭakādivadutkīlya na hastena cetaso 'panetavyāḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:554: tacca saṃśayabījaṃ yoginaḥ samādhyāloke sati prajñācakṣuṣā nirūpayatastesāṃ rūpādīnāṃ pūrvopalabdhānām upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptānām anupalambhād,
SA11bsa047_u:557: tathā saṃśayabījāpagamād rūpādinimittamanasikāraḥ śakyate varjayituṃ nānyathā /
SA11bsa047_u:558: anyathā hyasati samādhyāloke prajñācakṣuṣāpyanavaloke yathā andhakūpāvasthitapuruṣasyāvacarakagataghāṭādiṣviva yogino rūpādiṣvastitvasaṃśayo naiva nivarteta /
SA11bsa047_u:559: tadanivṛttyā cā prahīṇatimiradoṣasyeva yo 'yukto 'līkarūpādyabhiniveśaḥ pravarteta na kenāpi nivartyeta /
SA11bsa047_u:560: tasmāt samādhihastena manaḥ sandhāya sūkṣmataraprajñāśastreṇa tatra cetasi rūpādimithyāvikalpabījam uddharet /
SA11bsa047_u:562: taravo bhūmernirmūlatayā mithyāvikalpāḥ punaścetasi na virohanti /
SA11bsa047_u:563: ata evāvaraṇaprahāṇāya śamathavipaśyanāyuganaddhavāhī mārgo bhagavatā nirdiṣṭaḥ,
SA11bsa047_u:566: śīlaṃ pratiṣṭhāya samādhilābhāḥ samādhilābhācca hi prajñābhāvanā /
SA11bsa047_u:567: prajñayā jñānaṃ bhavati viśuddhaṃ viśuddhajñānasya hi śīlasampat // iti /
SA11bsa047_u:568: tathā hi yadā śamathenālambane cittaṃ sthirīkṛtaṃ bhavati tadā prajñayā vicārayataḥ samyagjñānāloka utpadyate,
SA11bsa047_u:573: sa ca samāhito yathābhūtaṃ prajānātīti vacanādekāntena prajñānukūla eva bhavati,
SA11bsa047_u:574: na tu viruddhastasmāt syāt samāhitasya prajñayā nirūpayataḥ sarvadharmāṇāmanupalambhaḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:579: tathā hi yadā prajñayā nirūpayan na kiñcid bhāvasvabhāvam upalabhate yogī,
SA11bsa047_u:584: yadā tu kālatraye 'pi bhāvo yoginā prajñācakṣuṣā nirūpayatā nopalabdhaḥ,
SA11bsa047_u:586: evamanye 'pi vikalpāstadā tasya na samutpadyanta eva bhāvābhāvavikalpābhyāṃ (Bhk 189)
SA11bsa047_u:590: tatra sthitasya yoginaḥ sarvavikalpānām astaṃgamāt samyak kleśāvaraṇaṃ jñeyāvaraṇaṃ ca prahīyate /
SA11bsa047_u:591: tathā hi kleśāvaraṇasyānutpannāniruddhabhāveṣu bhāvādiviparyāso mūlaṃ kāraṇam āryasatyadvayanirdeśādau varṇitaṃ bhagavatā /
SA11bsa047_u:592: anena ca yogābhyāsena sarvabhāvādivikalpānāṃ prahāṇāt sakalabhāvādiviparyāsasyāvidyāsvabhāvasya kleśāvaraṇamūlasya prahāṇam /
SA11bsa047_u:608: yaśca yoniśaḥ prayuktaḥ tasyātmasamāropo na bhavati /
SA11bsa047_u:609: yasyātmasamāropo na bhavati tasya dṛṣṭiparyutthānaṃ na bhavati /
SA11bsa047_u:610: yāvat paramārthato nirvāṇadṛṣṭisarva dṛṣṭiparyutthānam api na bhavati /
SA11bsa047_u:611: tasyaivam anutpādavihāriṇaḥ kleśā atyantaṃ vinītā draṣṭavyāḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:614: kleśān nirābhāsena jñānena paramārthato 'tyantaśūnyān atyantābhāvān atyantanirnimittāt prajānāti,
SA11bsa047_u:621: ya kleśānāṃ gotraṃ prajānāti tasya kleśāḥ praśāmyanti /
SA11bsa047_u:624: āha- yāvad eṣā paramārthato 'tyantājātānutpannābhāveṣu sarvadharmeṣu kalpanā idaṃ kleśānāṃ gotram” iti vistaraḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:626: tatprahāṇe sakalaviparyāsaprahāṇād jñeyāvaraṇam apyanena samyak prahīyate,
SA11bsa047_u:628: jñeyāvaraṇe ca prahīṇe pratibandhābhāvād ravikiraṇavad apagatameghādyāvaraṇe nabhasi sarvatrāvyāhato yogi pratyakṣo jñānālokaḥ pravartate /
SA11bsa047_u:630: tacca saṃnihitam api vastu pratibandhasadbhāvānna prakāśayati /
SA11bsa047_u:632: acintyaśaktiviśeṣalābhāt kimiti sakalam eva vastu yathāvad na prakāśayet /
SA11bsa047_u:633: ataḥ saṃvṛtiparamārtharūpeṇa sakalasya vastuno yathāvat parijñānāt sarvajñatvam avāpyate /
SA11bsa047_u:634: ato 'yam evāvaraṇaprahāṇo sarvajñatvādhigame ca paramo mārgaḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:635: yastu śrāvakādīnāṃ mārgastena viparyāsāprahāṇān na samyag āvaraṇadvayaṃ prahīyate /
SA11bsa047_u:636: tathā coktam āryalaṅkāvatāre- “anye tu kāraṇādhīnān sarvadharmān dṛṣṭvānirvāṇe 'pi nirvāṇam iti buddhayo bhavanti /
SA11bsa047_u:642: ata eva cānyena mārgeṇa mokṣābhāvād ekam eva yānam uktaṃ bhagavatā /
SA11bsa047_u:645: na tvātmāstīti bhāvayan śrāvakaḥ pudgalanairātmyam avatarati,
SA11bsa047_u:655: sā ceyaṃ yoginām avasthā kuto viśodhitā? ityāha-
SA11bsa047_u:658: tataḥ praṇidhānabalād uttarottaradānādikuśalābhyāsāt sā tathā viśuddhā jāta,
SA11bsa047_u:659: yena sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatājñāne 'pi sakalasattvāpekṣā na vyāvartate yāvat saṃsāra eva ananuliptāḥ saṃsāradoṣairavatiṣṭhanta iti /
SA11bsa047_u:661: jñānaṃ nirātmakaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ nirābhāsena paśyati / iti /
SA11bsa047_u:662: yasmād yad advayalakṣaṇaṃ jñānam advayavādināṃ śreṣṭhaṃ paramārthenābhimataṃ tadapi nirātmakaṃ niḥsvabhāvam advayanirābhāsena jñānena paśyati yogī /
SA11bsa047_u:670: kintu saṃvṛtyā yathā rūpādīviṣayākārajñānotpādamātreṇa vijñānameva loke tathā tathā vyavahriyate devadatto yajñadattaṃ jñānena paśyatīti na tu kaścid ātmādirasti /
SA11bsa047_u:671: tathātrāpi jñānamevādvayajñānanirābhāsam utpadyamānaṃ tathā vyapadiśyate nirābhāsena jñānena paśyatiti /
SA11bsa047_u:672: na hi sarvadharmāṇāṃ paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatve 'pi saṃvṛtyā yogijñānam anyad vā pṛthagjñānaṃ neṣṭam /
SA11bsa047_u:673: tathā coktam āryasatyadvayanirdeśe- “paramārthato 'tyantābhāvaśca saṃvṛttyā ca mārga bhāvayati” iti /
SA11bsa047_u:675: kintu yasya saṃvṛtyāpi kāraṇaṃ nāsti sa saṃvṛtyāpi notpadyate /
SA11bsa047_u:677: yasya tu [kāraṇaṃ] vidyate sa paramārthato 'līko 'pi samutpadyata eva /
SA11bsa047_u:679: na ca māyādeḥ saṃvṛtyā pratītyasamutpāde paramārthato vastutvaprasaṅgaḥ,
SA11bsa047_u:682: tatra yathā kleśakarmamāyāvaśāt sattvānāṃ janmamāyā pravarteta,
SA11bsa047_u:683: tathā yogināmapi puṇyajñānasambhāramāyāvaśād yogijñānamāyā pravartata eva /
SA11bsa047_u:692: te hi māyākāravat tāṃ māyāṃ yathāvat parijñānāt satyato nābhiniviśante, (Bhk 193)
SA11bsa047_u:694: ye tāṃ bālapṛthagjanavat kautūhalaṃ styatvenābhiniviṣṭāste viparītābhiniveśad bāla ucyante iti sarvamaviruddham /
SA11bsa047_u:697: na cāsya nirmite saṅgo jñātapūrvo yato 'sya saḥ //
SA11bsa047_u:701: tatra ca layauddhatyādīn vyutthitān pūrvavat praśamayet /
SA11bsa047_u:702: yadā tu sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatālambane ca layauddhatyādirahitam anabhisaṃskāreṇa pravṛttaṃ jñānaṃ bhavati,
SA11bsa047_u:704: tathā yāvat śaknoti tāvad adhimuktibalena adhimukticaryābhūmau sthito bhāvayet /
SA11bsa047_u:705: tato yathecchaṃ paryaṅkamābhujya vyutthāya punarevaṃ cintayet /
SA11bsa047_u:706: yadi nāmāmī dharmāḥ paramārthata eva niḥsvabhāvā apyete saṃvṛtyā sthitā eva /
SA11bsa047_u:707: tathā coktam āryaratnameghe- “kathaṃ bodhisattvo nairātmyakuśalo bhavati?
SA11bsa047_u:714: evaṃ vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasyotpādaṃ nopalabhate,
SA11bsa047_u:717: ayaṃ ca paramārthato 'nutpādavihāriṇyāḥ prajñāyā na punarvyāvahārikeṇa svabhāvena” iti vistaraḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:718: ete ca bālabuddhaya evaṃ niḥsvabhāveṣu bhāveṣu (Bhk 194)
SA11bsa047_u:719: viparītābhiniveśāt saṃsāre paribhramanto vividhāni duḥkhāni pratyanubhavanti /
SA11bsa047_u:720: mahākaruṇām eva āmukhīkṛtya evamanuvicintayet- tathāhaṃ kariṣyāmi yathā sarvajñatvaṃ prāpya eteṣāṃ dharmatāmavabodhayeyamiti /
SA11bsa047_u:723: tathā coktam āryadharmasaṃgītau- “yathābhūtadarśino bodhisattvasya sattveṣu mahākaruṇā pravartate /
SA11bsa047_u:724: evaṃ cāsya bhavati- idaṃ mayā samādhimukhaṃ sarvadharmayathābhūtadarśaṃ ca sarvasattvānāṃ nispādayitavyam /
SA11bsa047_u:725: sa tayā mahākaruṇayā saṃcodyamāno 'dhiśīlam adhicittam adhiprajñaṃ ca śikṣātrayaṃ paripūryānuttaraṃ samyaksambodhim abhisambudhyate” iti /
SA11bsa047_u:726: ayameva prajñopāyayuganaddhabāhī bodhisattvānāṃ mārgo yat paramārthadarśane 'pi saṃvṛtiṃ nocchedayanti /
SA11bsa047_u:727: saṃvṛtiṃ cānucchedayanto mahākaruṇāpūrvaṅgamā aviparyastā eva sattvārthakriyāsu pravartante /
SA11bsa047_u:733: na ca taddhetukaṃ tannidānaṃ tatpratyayam ucchedadṛṣṭau patati” iti /
SA11bsa047_u:742: sā mayā (Bhk 195) pratipattiḥ pratipattavyā sarvasattvānāṃ hitāvahā sukhāvahā /
SA11bsa047_u:743: tasya skandheṣu māyāvat pratyavekṣaṇā pratipattirna ca skandhaparityāgaṃ spṛhayatīti /
SA11bsa047_u:744: dhātuṣvāśīviṣavat pratyavekṣaṇā pratipattirna ca dhātuparityāgaṃ spṛhayatīti /
SA11bsa047_u:746: rūpasya phenapiṇḍavat pratyavekṣaṇā pratipattirna ca tathāgatarūpakāyaviṭhapanāṃ jahāti /
SA11bsa047_u:747: vedanāyā budbudvat pratyavekṣaṇā pratipattirna ca tathāgatadhyānasamādhisamāpattisukhaniṣpadanaprayogaṃ nārabhate /
SA11bsa047_u:748: saṃjñāyāṃ marīcivat pratyavekṣaṇā pratipattirna ca tathāgatajñānaniṣpādana apratipattiḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:749: saṃskārāṇāṃ kadalīvat pratyavekṣaṇā pratipattirna ca buddhadharmasaṃskārāṇām apratipattiḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:750: vijñānasya māyāvat pratyavekṣaṇā pratipattirna ca jñānapūrvaṅgamakāyavāṅmanaskarmaniṣpādanā pratipattiḥ” iti vistaraḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:752: tatra yadi nāma lokottaraprajñāvasthāyām upāyasevanā na sambhavati,
SA11bsa047_u:753: upāyasevanākāle tu bodhisattvasya māyākāravad aviparyastatvāt lokottarajñānāt prayogapṛṣṭhabhāvani yathāvad vastuparamārthatattvābhiniveśanī prajñāsambhavatyeveti,
